events.name: To Start off Name the boy

parameters: Why'd you call me a dumb name like that?
What a horrible night to be \P[1]!
I need to grab my uniform and go.
Just shitty, \.like usual, \.I need a nap.
You weren't even gone for long.
You right, I'll have a drink and play some
games for a bit, before heading to bed.
I spilt my drink all over my stuff!\!
That was pretty rough, \.well, \.time for bed.
Suddenly, \|I feel motivated to do something\.
I should have done \.a long time ago.
\FS[15]He should really learn to close his eyes.\!
I need to grab my uniform.
I should put some clothes on.
And I don't intend to leave it.
Surprisingly, it's great place to piss and/or
As long as you don't fall in, or somethin'.
Surprisingly, it's great place to piss and/or
As long as you don't fall in, \.or somethin'.
Actually, it looks like a CD fell in here...
I should do this more often!
\P[1] went on to change their bed sheets weekly
and never forgot to empty the washing machine after
\P[1] even began to write great stories!
\P[1] still needs to do the dishes!
I don't have time right now.
Yo, what was all that noise?
I'll deal with those after work.
I don't feel like dealing with those at
After I change my bedsheets, for sure, though.
After I change my bedsheets, for sure, though.
I don't have time right now.
I need to visit there sometime\..\..\..
but,\. hey,\. at least this anvil is just as
